records.location_details: Information from an NGO about a migrant boat in distress south of Lesvos in Greek territorial waters. NGO posted additional coordinates (38.887833, 26.446500). Turkish Coast Guard rescue records indicate 10:55 am LT off the coast of İzmir's Karaburun district. NGO later published a more detailed version stating the boat was in distress 'deep inside Greek waters, southeast of Plomari, Lesvos south' at first light on 19/02/2024, 8.35 km distance from the shoreline of Lesvos. Greek authorities reported two incidents at 38° 48' 00" N 026° 26' 18" E and 38° 46' 24" N, 026° 26' 18" E, both 'Lesvos island inside Turkish TTW'.
records.location_text_raw: south of Lesvos in Greek territorial waters
records.uncertainty_note: Multiple coordinates provided by different sources (NGO, Greek authorities) with slight variations. The exact point of the alleged incident is not definitively confirmed, but the general area is consistent.

possible_violations.legal_basis: Article 2 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union
Article 19 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of inhuman or degrading treatment
possible_violations.legal_basis: Article 4 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union

records.context_note: The Fundamental Rights Office established that Frontex encountered the migrant boat but could not verify the timeline of events preceding the rescue by the Turkish Coast Guard. The alleged modus operandi (engine destruction, towing to Turkish waters) is consistent with previously highlighted practices of the Hellenic Coast Guard. Concerns were raised about incomplete Frontex operational reporting and insufficient cooperation from Greek authorities. Recommendations were made to both Frontex and Greek authorities to improve reporting, safeguards, and investigation of fundamental rights violations.
records.evidence_quote: Based on the available information, the Fundamental Rights Office has established that Frontex encountered the migrant boat in question and considers likely that this encounter happened in the morning hours of 19/02/2024
